title: Create whitewater kayak design showcase website

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store whitewater kayak designs with fields for kayak name, manufacturer, design year, image URL, and external link URL
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores kayak design entries with all required fields
Data can be queried and retrieved from the backend

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to add new kayak designs and retrieve all kayak designs sorted by design year (newest first)
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can add new kayak designs through backend method
Kayak designs are returned in descending order by year

requirements.text: Build a frontend gallery view that displays all kayak designs as cards showing the kayak image, name, manufacturer, year, and a clickable link to view more details
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays all kayak designs in a responsive grid layout
Each card shows kayak image, name, manufacturer, and year
External links open in new tabs when clicked
Cards are ordered with newest designs first

requirements.text: Create an admin form to add new kayak designs with input fields for name, manufacturer, year, image URL, and external link URL
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required input fields
Successfully submitted designs appear in the gallery immediately

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme inspired by whitewater kayaking with dynamic water-themed colors (teals, aqua, deep blues, whites), energetic typography, and flowing layouts that evoke movement and adventure
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses water-inspired tones throughout the interface
Typography and spacing create a sense of energy and flow
Layout and interaction patterns feel cohesive with the kayaking theme

requirements.text: Render generated kayak-themed hero background and kayak icon logo from static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays generated background image
Logo appears in header using generated icon asset
Images load correctly from public assets directory

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, or ui components
Generated images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
nonGoals: Integration with external kayak manufacturer APIs
User authentication for viewing kayak designs

required: Dynamic whitewater rapids hero background with flowing water and spray (hero-rapids.dim_1920x600.png)
Stylized whitewater kayak icon logo with paddle (kayak-logo.dim_200x200.png)
